# python-obfuscator
binary and base64 encoding obfuscator

obfuscates code into base64 then binary with decryptors built into so the file can run natively

# Example code:
starts with:
print("haha lol XD :flushed:")

ends with:

watermark = ("Wow this is all it takes to make an 'obfuscator'... sad!")

O101010010000 = eval(''.join(chr(int("00111000"[i*8:i*8+8],2)) for i in range(len("00111000")//8)))
O011101110101 = eval(''.join(chr(int("01100101011110000110010101100011"[i*8:i*8+8],2)) for i in range(len("01100101011110000110010101100011")//8)))
O011001100100 = eval(''.join(chr(int("00100111001001110010111001101010011011110110100101101110"[i*8:i*8+8],2)) for i in range(len("00100111001001110010111001101010011011110110100101101110")//8)))
O001000111111 = eval(''.join(chr(int("011000110110100001110010"[i*8:i*8+8],2)) for i in range(len("011000110110100001110010")//8)))
O010011010101 = eval(''.join(chr(int("011010010110111001110100"[i*8:i*8+8],2)) for i in range(len("011010010110111001110100")//8)))
O110110110111 = eval(''.join(chr(int("0111001001100001011011100110011101100101"[i*8:i*8+8],2)) for i in range(len("0111001001100001011011100110011101100101")//8)))
O111110010001 = eval(''.join(chr(int("011011000110010101101110"[i*8:i*8+8],2)) for i in range(len("011011000110010101101110")//8)))
O100000101101 = eval(''.join(chr(int("00110010"[i*8:i*8+8],2)) for i in range(len("00110010")//8)))

O011101110101(O011001100100(O001000111111(O010011010101(("")[O101101000011*O101010010000:O101101000011*O101010010000+O101010010000],O100000101101)) for O101101000011 in O110110110111(O111110010001((""))//O101010010000)))
